title: Which company has produced the most batteries? - Quora

response.answer_text: Panasonic company has supplied the most number of batteries for most uses. Panasonic firstly started of with the Zinc Carbon batteries and also manufactured Alkaline and Rechargeable Batteries (NiCd and NiMH). They also supply button cells and Lead Acid batteries. They are also manufacturers of lithium ion batteries and manufactured 18650 cylindrical cells for the Tesla Model S. Therefore, Panasonic has produced more batteries than most other companies. However, also companies like GS Yuasa and Hitachi cooperation have produced a lot of batteries for various purposes. However, we cannot consider by brands, Japan and China are two countries which produce a lot of batteries. However, Japan mostly manufacturers high profile name brand batteries which are mostly used in expensive products and expensive applications. Chinese producers on the other hand supply both name brand as well as generic batteries and thus has a huge market share in the international market. China has more than 2000 manufacturers of lithium ion batteries and manufactures a lot of Lithium Ferrous Phosphate Batteries and Lithium Titanium Oxide Batteries, thus making it an ideal exporter and manufacturer of lithium ion batteries.
